textContent:
---post-valentines blues---

Hello! I'm writing this while you are sleeping (as per usual), and I just wanted to talk about how thankful I am about our Valentine's date. 

You made me so happy Rei!! With your very thoughtful gifts (which I was very very surprised to receive kase wth, anime merch yung regalo? How perfect are you? Huhuhu I love you so much!!). 

Kinakain ko right now yung choco mushroom and I can't believe how lucky I am that you thought to give it to me. It's the small things that mean a lot Rei huhu. And the fact that you remembered in something as small as chocolate snacks? That means a lot to me Rei. I really feel included in your life! 

And you are in mine as well!!!! You already play a big factor in the decisions I make in my every day life and you make every decision happier and easier because it's you I think about when I decide! Thank you so much Rei!!! You're forever valentine!
title: February 16, 2024
textContentHtml:
---post-valentines blues---


Hello! I'm writing this while you are sleeping (as per usual), and I just wanted to talk about how thankful I am about our Valentine's date. 


You made me so happy Rei!! With your very thoughtful gifts (which I was very very surprised to receive kase wth, anime merch yung regalo? How perfect are you? Huhuhu I love you so much!!). 


Kinakain ko right now yung choco mushroom and I can't believe how lucky I am that you thought to give it to me. It's the small things that mean a lot Rei huhu. And the fact that you remembered in something as small as chocolate snacks? That means a lot to me Rei. I really feel included in your life! 


And you are in mine as well!!!! You already play a big factor in the decisions I make in my every day life and you make every decision happier and easier because it's you I think about when I decide! Thank you so much Rei!!! You're forever valentine!
